Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.SalesforceListActivity
    Please note SalesforceListActivity inherits from the Android SDK's deprecated android.app.ListActivity. Similar to the instructions in ListActivity, use SalesforceActivity with androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView to implement your Activity instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest.ClientManager.createNewAccount(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Map<String, String>, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Boolean, String, String)
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.OAuth2.getFrontdoorUrl(URI, String, String, Map<String, String>)
    Use RestRequest.getRequestForSingleAccess(String) instead
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.HttpAccess.getOkHttpClientBuilder()
    To be removed in 14.0. Please use HttpAccess.createNewClientBuilder() instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.HttpAccess.getUnauthenticatedOkHttpBuilder()
    To be removed in 14.0. Please use HttpAccess.createNewClientBuilder() instead.
